Name: Wolfpack Island
About the game: Wolfpack Island, a multiplayer wolf virtual world Explore an island, meet others wolves in a multiplayer world, mine for resources, plant and harvest crops and take part in a wide-range of mini-games and activities! Features Mine for resources Complete quests to get rare items for your wolf Compete against your friends in minigames Tend to and plant in your farm Chat with friends Shop for new clothing items for your wolf and much more, plus new content regularly!
Meta Title: Wolfpack Island: Dec 3, 2021, Zeptars and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Wolfpack Island? Check out the release date (Dec 3, 2021), developer insights from Zeptars, and a complete game summary.
